description: A pun playing on 'ketch up' and 'catch up.'
title: Tomato Race
n_1: Timmy struggles behind in the garden race.
n_2: Tammy looks back, noticing Timmy's slow pace.
c1_2: I'm trying, but I ripen slowly!
c2_2: You can do it, just push a bit!
n_3: Timmy tries to speed up, panting.
c1_3: This is harder than I thought!
n_4: As they near the finish line, Timmy makes a joke.
c1_4: Don’t worry, I’ll ketch up soon!
c2_4: That's the spirit, and the pun!
